author: g11tech
content: hi guys, is there a reference document/spec for json rpc end points for transaction access list that one might be computing for w.r.t. EIP 2929

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: Not yet, we have a preliminary version in geth, but that is subject to change once I finally come around to proposing a standard

author: g11tech
content: is it possible if i could have a look at any prelim doc or the PR, i just want to study it a bit to gain my understanding of access list generation process
